moves.1. e4: most people push the pawn in front of king at start, but i do not like it
moves.3. Nc3: developing a knight and controlling the center
moves.3... Na6: i develop my knight to the flank
moves.4. Be3: white may have the center, but i have 2 flanks, and 2 is better than 1
moves.4... Nf6: i couldn't move this knight to the flank because of Qxh5
moves.5... d6: scared of him attacking my knight
moves.6... c6: preparing to launch an attack when he castles!! It was at this point when I knew that I might win with an attack on the queenside.... which I did!!! and he was 1700!!!!
moves.7. O-O-O: he castles right into the attack!!!
moves.8... d5: i move my pawn twice but i don't like the idea of his pawn on d5 so i move there myself
moves.9. Nge2 Be6 10. Nf4: my bishop is not long-range here so i do not care if it is taken
moves.10... Qd7 11. Kb1: the downside to castling queenside is you have to move king twice instead of once like with kingside castling
moves.11... Nc7: I want control of d5 with as much pieces as possible
moves.13. Bd3 O-O-O: I decide it is worth it to castle queenside even though i might move king again, the kingside looks f**king dangerous
moves.14. g4: see he has quick pawn storm on kingside
moves.14... hxg4 15. hxg4 Bg7: glad i am not castled by that open h-file!!
moves.16. Nxe6: i never really cared about that bisgop
moves.16... Qxe6 17. g5 Nh5:
I decide to go to the flank, I control 2 flanks, he controls 1 center.

2 > 1
moves.18... dxe4: i break the center a little
moves.19. Bxe4 b4: continuing the queenside attack i planned
moves.20. f5: attacking my queen, now i can't take his bishop next move
moves.20... Qd6: I move my queen to safety
moves.23. Bxf5 Kb7: he has to move knight again
moves.24. Nc4: i have to move  queen again
moves.24... Qd5: i move my queen and attack his knight
moves.25. b3: he defends knight but creates a weakness to his king
moves.26. Rd3: WHAT?!?!?!?!?!?! a 1700s player just loses a rook for nothing ?????????????
moves.27. Kb2: I didn't know they did that
moves.28. Bg4 Qb1#: I had a feeling I would win with a queenside attack, I felt it even before he castled queenside!!!!
